name: JUNUT
short_description:
Junut - distributed search engine with support for the morphology of all the languages ​​of the world, a reference matrix of the Internet and multi-level ranking of search results.

Summary:
- Improved search. Through partners, a distributed search engine to find more information than the other search engines.
- Always up to date information. Due to the high performance of a distributed search engine can quickly update information on the site.
- Analysis of the content. Thanks to unlimited resources distributed search engine can best is carefully analyzing the information found.
- The growth of productivity. Growth performance with growth of the Internet.
- High performance. All the own resources system focused on improving the speed of delivery, while the problem of searching on the Internet are distributed among users.
- High stability. Due to the distributed, the system can not be put out of action.
- Ability to search multimedia content.
- Ability for users to earn.
